content=A botanic park and contemporary-art expo that is well-maintained. Great lagoons, grass, all sorts of palm trees and forest.  There are galleries and pieces from various contemporary-artists including Cildo Meireles, Adriana Varej√£o, Miguel Rio Branco and Matthew Barney.  There are restaurants and snack bars inside the park (you're not supposed to bring food). The park can be reached by bus from Belo Horizonte - Saritur
has a bus that goes directly to the park everyday. Departure from the central rodoviaria at 9:15AM, comes back from the park at 4:30PM. Around R$25 return trip. This is a 2 hours trip.
